nodes.name: Accelerators
nodes.summary: Top menu buttons should have automatically generated (A)ccelerator keys you can Alt + press to click the button

nodes.name: Stolen Goods
nodes.summary: Keep journal notes of locations where your stolen goods are confiscated and possibly stored.The information will also be copied to the Windows clipboard.

nodes.name: Slo Mo
nodes.summary: Enter Slow Motion mode on selected animation events (Kill / Knock / Hit) or Mouse Wheel Combo

nodes.name: Bumpity Bump
nodes.summary: The mod you didn't know you needed ;-)

nodes.name: Quicker Keys
nodes.summary: Click on a quick key slot to use it, Shift+click to assign it to a spell, magic item or inventory item.

nodes.name: Crouching Tiger
nodes.summary: Allow to jump from crouching position (giving player a temporary Acrobatics buff in the process).

nodes.name: Squeaky Wheel Gets The Kick
nodes.summary: Change Player Point Of View/Zoom by scrolling mouse wheel.

nodes.name: Door Locks
nodes.summary: Dynamic loading doors locking according to time of day cycle, location, faction, disposition...Meant as a more general/dynamic replacement of Living Cities of Vvardenfell Locks mod, but it works with or without it already installed.Also can

nodes.name: Inventory Sorter
nodes.summary: Use the defined Sorting Order Key/Right Mouse Click Combos to select Inventory/Contents/Barter items secondary sorting order.

nodes.name: CUA Dropdown
nodes.summary: Makes MCM DropDown CUA (Common User Access) compliant displaying in the dropdown list all the available options (included the currently selected one)

nodes.name: Well Behaved Sound Replacers
nodes.summary: try and fix bad-behaved MWSE-Lua sound replacer mods and playSound function

nodes.name: Smart Topics
nodes.summary: Press Shift while clicking a dialog topic to log/paste to clipboard the dialog INFOPress Shift while activating an actor to log to MWSE.log/paste to clipboard the next dialog greeting INFO triggered by that actor.Press Ctrl + Shift while

nodes.name: Smart Battle Music
nodes.summary: only attack to/from player will trigger Battle music

nodes.name: Anti Deprecated
nodes.summary: Allow to automatically Disable/Delete pesky deprecated objects on the fly,including those obnoxious/immersion breaking inventory items labeled as "deprecated/depreciated".

nodes.name: Slim Stats
nodes.summary: A simple mod to rearrange player stats menu in one column so no screen space is wasted but things can be added to the scroller

nodes.name: Gameplay tweaks
nodes.summary: A MWSE-Lua mod to detect/tweak/fix other non-Lua mods I'm using

nodes.name: Now Playing
nodes.summary: Info about/open current playing music track

nodes.name: More Traps MWSE-Lua
nodes.summary: Dynamically/randomly locks/traps more (not yet interacted with) containers and doors

nodes.name: Hide Grass
nodes.summary: Hide/delete most grass statics references on the fly to be rendered as moving grass by MGE-XE instead.

nodes.name: gspeed
nodes.summary: Hotkeys to adjust player Running/Walking/Sneaking speed. + strafe fix toggle

nodes.name: Click Clears Input
nodes.summary: Makes MCM filter/Console text input clear by clicking the input text space.If you have UIExpansion installed it should  also work with most of UI Expansion text input filters (unless you have other mod conflicts. At least, it works for me,

nodes.name: Footprints
nodes.summary: Actors Footprints

nodes.name: TR ugly deprecated red cubes fix
nodes.summary: A simple replacer for the ugly deprecated  red cube meshes  making them invisible in game and such no more ruining player immersion

nodes.name: Smart Chasers
nodes.summary: Hostiles following through loading doors

nodes.name: Detect Key Fix
nodes.summary: Try and fix non-detectable keys.Latest MWSE-Lua required

nodes.name: Smart Shield
nodes.summary: Auto equip last equipped shield/parrying weapon on 1 handed weapon readied.

nodes.name: Keepers
nodes.summary: Marks with a suffix character (! by default) items you may want to keep/avoid selling, including:- keys counted/used to open something in game- player items counted in dialog filters- other player items counted and removed from

nodes.name: Hot Lava
nodes.summary: Lava and similar scripted damage sources should use fire damage instead.More realistic and also a fire atronach will no more die walking in lava.

nodes.name: Player Made Magic Rename
nodes.summary: Player Made Magic RenameCTRL + Click to rename a player made spell or enchanted item from player magic menuCTRL + Equip on paperdoll to rename a player made constant enchanted item from player inventory menu

nodes.name: Smart Rings
nodes.summary: Rings are given enchanting tiers(1 = No Enchantment, 2 = On Use Enchantment, 3 = Constant Enchantment).When you have the maximum number of rings already equipped and you equip another ring,a lower tier ring will be unequipped if available

nodes.name: Darkening
nodes.summary: on the fly darkening of any interior cell without per-cell customization/color storageNote: as cells light changes are cached per Morrowind.exe game session, changes done in the MCM panel are effective only on visiting a not yet visited

nodes.name: Doors Anti Stuck
nodes.summary: Avoid actors getting stuck while opening doors

nodes.name: Revolving Doors Blocker
nodes.summary: A quick and dirty blocker for doors going nowhere.

nodes.name: Smart Intervention
nodes.summary: This mod gives you two ways you can know the closest Intervention spell destination.

nodes.name: Give or Take
nodes.summary: Adds "Give" and "Take" buttons to any suitable actor/container, so you can easily move (all/all filtered) things in and out with Lua speed.

nodes.name: Smart Activate
nodes.summary: Actors menu to choose who to activate between nearby actors.Auto facing: Selected actors slowly turns around and face player on activateBlink Fix: Try and reduce actor blinking eyes remaining closed while talking with player in 1st person

nodes.name: MWSE-Lua NPC Birthsigns
nodes.summary: Gives birthsign abilities to NPCs, on combat start/when a follower is activated by player as this should cover any NPC potentially using them

nodes.name: Mod List
nodes.summary: A MWSE-Lua MCM panel to see and copy to Windows clipboard your current standard mods loading order + your loaded MWSE-Lua mods, so you can easily paste it online in case of problems.

nodes.name: Smart Heads
nodes.summary: randomizes cloned NPCs standard heads

nodes.name: Smart Companions
nodes.summary: Makes companions (the ones with the short companion local variable set to 1) able to interact with possible loot sources and doors you Alt+Activate, can fix/improve some companions/followers features, detect abot's modded Scenic Travelling

nodes.name: Hot Quests
nodes.summary: hotkeys for journal Quests and Topics

nodes.name: Read Aloud
nodes.summary: Makes the player (and only the player) able to read aloud books, scrolls, signs, banners and road markers, updated Journal entries, Journal pages, selected dialog choices, and Daedric text translated from enchanted scrolls. You can now read

nodes.name: Who's where
nodes.summary: Shows in a dedicated MCM panel the interesting actors you talked to and where you can find them.

nodes.name: Vanity
nodes.summary: Visible equipped amulets & rings

nodes.name: Passing Time While Reading - MWSE Lua version
nodes.summary: Passing Time While Reading - MWSE Lua version

nodes.name: NOM MC integration
nodes.summary: adds NOM/Morrowind Crafting ingredients to suitable killed creatures, drag & drop food/drinks over player paperdoll, activate and drink from most water source meshes and kegs, activate and NOM roast from most firepit/log pile/hot coals,

nodes.name: Water Sounds
nodes.summary: Water Sound for MWSE-Lua - simulate water sound when colliding with generic fake animated water meshes

nodes.name: Smart Merchants
nodes.summary: Smart Merchants for MWSE-Lua inspired from HotFusion's Economy Adjuster and Wakim's game settings, no need of a separate .esp, and no need of extra dialog greetings

nodes.name: Plain Paper Fix
nodes.summary: A MWSE-Lua mod allowing to pick up a blank sheet of paper without having to read it in Scroll context and then click on "TAKE" from the Scroll Interface before getting it.Differently from standard scripting available mods it does it without

nodes.name: MWSEabotlib
nodes.summary: abot\lib.lua common file used by several of my MWSE-Lua mods so you can have the most up-to-date version easily downloadable here

nodes.name: Smart Journal
nodes.summary: several new options for journal pages and quests list

nodes.name: Smart Ammo
nodes.summary: Ammo autoequip while bow/crossbow/thrown weapon readied. It will remember and prefer last hand-picked ammo if pressing Alt while equipping it.requires latest MWSE-Lua dev

nodes.name: Smart Helmet
nodes.summary: Alt + Z (by default, you can change it) will swap helmet On/OffYou can set the mod to automatically swap helmet on cellchange depending on:- number/distance/fight of hostiles around- current weather- allow/disallow automatic unequipping of

nodes.name: Smart Map
nodes.summary: Basically it tries to automatically smart-switch between local and world map view.

nodes.name: Loading Doors Lock Tune
nodes.summary: Automatically synchronizes linked doors locked/unlocked state on activate, lock/unlock by spell, unlock by lockpick, key.Should work great with mods like pursuit enhanced allowing NPCs to chase you through doors and give purpose to the lock

nodes.name: Tooltip
nodes.summary: Displays Value/Weight Ratio of currently focused object/inventory item in tooltip. Display of Skillbook teached skill may and mod source also be enabled from the MCM control panel

nodes.name: Morrowind Resources Scanner
nodes.summary: Generates information logs about your entire current Morrowind loading list:- current resource files in Data Files folders- resource files missing from Data Files folders- used resource files- unused resource files- can clean your Data

nodes.name: Arynx Castle for Tamriel Rebuilt
nodes.summary: Arynx Castle by Hemitheon made compatible with Tamriel Rebuilt

nodes.name: SOPP Solstheim Overhaul Pack Project
nodes.summary: An updated Solstheim Overhaul esm with a pack of related/merged mod replacers made compatible with each other without need of extra .esp patches

nodes.name: More Traps
nodes.summary: Dynamically traps/locks some more containers and doors. More challenge for the looters, hopefully compatible with most present and future mods...

nodes.name: ACEG
nodes.summary: Uses tes3cmd.exe and TESTool.exe to generate "MW Containers Animated exp.esp" to add animations by Arcimaestro Antares/scripts by qqqbbb to related containers having no script in your modlist.

nodes.name: Galleo_AW_Shields_Back_lite
nodes.summary:
Galleo AW Shields Back lite/en 

Original mod by Galib

ver. 1.4 lite changes
- shield swapping also with thrown weapons

nodes.name: Gondoliers
nodes.summary: real time travel Vivec gondoliers

nodes.name: Tel Nechim (moved version)
nodes.summary: Tel Nechim by Antiscamp, moved NE of Necrom for compatibility with Tamriel Rebuilt, plus added a Mash-NOMified version for NOM users

nodes.name: Where are all birds going
nodes.summary: Where are all birds going? An attempt to bind flawed Morrowind AI to bring life to most beautiful birds.This plugin adds to Morrowind peaceful flying animals based on the wonderful models & textures by Lady Eternity & Proudfoot, Cait Sith,

nodes.name: RainSplash
nodes.summary: Rain splashes should appear here and there around player when it is raining.

nodes.name: Move or Take My Place
nodes.summary: take my place + move away when pressing alt key

nodes.name: Guars
nodes.summary: You can find ashlander guar tamers in Ald-ruhn, Gnisis, Khuul, Ahemmusa Camp, Zainab Camp;talk with/bribe the ashlander guar tamers about smart mountable guars...

nodes.name: Mills of Morrowind expansion
nodes.summary:
Expansion/replacer to [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/42380/]original mod[/URL] by RubberMan
, with  scripted sawing animation and new Hirstaang Forest Mill

nodes.name: Menu Time
nodes.summary: Purpose: Adding real time passed in menu mode to game time when out of menu mode

nodes.name: Scroll Daedric Alphabet
nodes.summary:
After many years playing Morrowind, I still can\'t read daedric on the fly.
This mod replaces the standard scroll mesh with one adding a daedric alphabet note, useful to role play deciphering the scroll in game.
It should be compatible with

nodes.name: Water Life
nodes.summary: Water Life is an attempt to mix the scripting techniques developed in the "Where are all bird going?" plugin with the best aquatic creature modding resources to bring more life into Morrowind waters.This plugin mainly adds to Morrowind

nodes.name: Shrines 0 Gold Fix
nodes.summary: Normally shrines ask for 0 gold for blessings when your guild rank is two or better, this mod simply makes shrines give you blessing without asking for 0 gold.

nodes.name: Windows Glow Expansion
nodes.summary: Replaces many windows with scripted dynamic glowing windows & lights,

nodes.name: Boats
nodes.summary: You can travel by boat, ship and river strider in real time, and dismount anywhere in between trip starting and ending points

nodes.name: Silt Striders
nodes.summary: I wanted to travel Morrowind on top of a real Silt Strider so strongly, and after years waiting for some similar mod to be completed, I decided to try myself.

nodes.name: TR Water Sounds
nodes.summary: Latest Tamriel Rebuilt requiredReplaces most TR static water meshes with activators emulating water splashing sounds.
